entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mildred Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mildred Lake 3:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -16.1°C
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm in areas south of Fort McMurray. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
